projects.title: VideoTube - Full-Stack Video Platform
projects.shortDescription: A comprehensive video streaming platform built with MERN stack
projects.description: VideoTube is a full-featured video streaming platform similar to YouTube, built from scratch using the MERN stack. It includes user authentication, video upload/streaming, comments, likes, subscriptions, and a recommendation system.
keyFeatures: User authentication with JWT and bcrypt
Video upload and streaming with Cloudinary integration
Like/dislike functionality for videos and comments
challenges: Implementing efficient video streaming with chunk-based delivery
Designing a scalable database schema for relationships
Optimizing query performance for recommendation system
learnings: File upload handling with Multer and cloud storage

projects.title: Aadhaar Crowd Management System
projects.shortDescription: OCR-based crowd management system for Aadhaar centers
projects.description: A smart queue management system for Aadhaar enrollment centers using OCR technology to reduce wait times and improve service efficiency. The system includes slot booking, real-time queue management, and admin dashboard.
challenges: Ensuring data privacy and security for PII
Designing for low digital literacy users

projects.title: Curita - AI-Powered Interactive Toy
projects.shortDescription: ML-driven interactive toy with speech recognition and NLP
projects.description: An intelligent interactive toy that uses machine learning to engage with children through speech recognition, natural language processing, and personalized responses. Currently under development at INavLabs.
keyFeatures: Adaptive learning based on user interactions
challenges: Optimizing ML models for edge devices

projects.title: LeetCode Progress Tracker
projects.shortDescription: Web app to track and visualize coding practice progress
projects.description: A personal dashboard to track LeetCode problem-solving progress with visualizations, statistics, and goal setting features.
keyFeatures: Problem categorization by difficulty and topic

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.shortDescription: Responsive portfolio website with modern design
projects.description: A fully responsive personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience with modern UI/UX design patterns.
